subject: Urgent Business Proposal.
body:
Urgent Business Proposal.
I am Mr. Desmond Campbell, I work with the investor's center of the
London stock exchange group Plc. We have for some years now, been
dealing with some unclaimed shares running to the tune of 8.4 Million
Thousand Pounds and recently my boss secretly decided to sell it off
with the intention that the two of us will make use of the fund for
investment outside the stock house.
An American investor has paid for the unclaimed shares in Dollars and
the cash has been received and saved in China Citic Bank (CCB) for
onward movement outside the Country. But unfortunately, my boss passed
away two months ago, and the family has read his last testament (WILL)
without mentioning anything about this cash deposited in China Citic
Bank (CCB).
So at this point, I was the only person that knew this deal and where
this money was. But,  since I cannot do it alone, I contacted my boss
wife and told her all that transpired while her husband was alive and
I am the only trusted partner who knows about this money because of
this, she has given me the go ahead order to make sure I get a trusted
person  overseas who will receive this fund and share it, so that her
family will make use of their own share of the money to complete her
husbandâ€™s intention and his soul will rest in peace.
The total amount in Dollars is US$10,636,352.96 and this amount is
still available in China Citic Bank (CCB). Reply via my private email:
( 
mrdesmondcampbell001@gmail.com
 ), while a legal practitioner will
use these details to get a legal permit for you to receive this cash
outside this Country for our sharing. You will be given 30% out of the
total sum.
Your cooperation is highly expected to help this widow and her children.
Yours truly,
Mr. Desmond Campbell
Email:mrdesmondcampbell001@gmail.com

subject: Re:    Urgent Business Proposal.
body:
Hello Mr. Desmond Campbell,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this urgent business proposal. I must say, it sounds quite intriguing. I'm sorry to hear about the passing of your boss and the situation surrounding the unclaimed shares.

I would be interested to know more about how this process works and what my role would be in helping the widow and her children. Could you please provide me with some additional details? How exactly would we go about receiving the funds from China Citic Bank CCB? And what legal permits are required for me to receive the cash outside of the country?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Bradley
